name: Spenco 2nd Skin Blister Pads (5 Pack) - Unisex
description: Despite your best efforts at prevention, blisters can happen. If they do, these soft, self-adhesive pads stay in place up to five days to protect afflicted areas as they heal.Made of sterile, soft, hydrocolloid material.Pack of five.Each pad is 60 x 45mm.
